scripts.build:css: sass src/scss/main.scss:build/css/style-temp.css --style=expanded --source-map && postcss build/css/style-temp.css -o style.css --map && postcss src/tailwind.css -o tailwind.css --map
scripts.watch:css: sass src/scss/main.scss:build/css/style-temp.css --style=expanded --source-map --watch & postcss build/css/style-temp.css -o style.css --map --watch & postcss src/tailwind.css -o tailwind.css --map --watch
scripts.build:css:prod: sass src/scss/main.scss:build/css/style-temp.css --style=compressed --no-source-map && postcss build/css/style-temp.css -o style.css --no-map --env production && postcss src/tailwind.css -o tailwind.css --no-map --env production
scripts.build: npm run build:css:prod && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npm run build:css && npm run build:js:dev
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.verify-build: test -f style.css && test -f tailwind.css && test -f build/js/main.js && test -f build/js/admin.js && test -f build/js/main.asset.php && test -f build/js/admin.asset.php && echo 'âœ… Build verification passed'
